author:
Andrew Lynch                    

                                    
                        @andrewlynch
description: The San Antonio Spurs could have shocked the world without Kawhi Leonard. Now, they need to pack it in.
title: There's absolutely no reason for Kawhi Leonard to play Game 4 of Spurs-Warriors

author: Michael C. WrightESPN Staff Writer
description: Spurs PF LaMarcus Aldridge sees himself as the helper to Kawhi Leonard. With Leonard ruled out, can the Spurs help the helper and keep afloat in Game 3?
title: With Kawhi out, LaMarcus Aldridge to step front and center for Spurs

description: Kawhi Leonard's injured left ankle will keep him out of Saturday's Game 3 of the Western Conference finals against the Warriors, Spurs coach Gregg Popovich said at the pregame shootaround.
title: Spurs rule Leonard (ankle) out for Game 3
